question: What is the duration of the fest?
answer: The fest will last for 3 days, from 3rd November to 5th November, 2023.

question: What type of cultural activities and performances can I expect at the fest?
answer: We will be organizing a variety of competitions, performances, and celebrity guest appearances on behalf of the cultural fraternities of our college. You can expect music, dance, DJ nights, and much more!

question: How do I participate in fest activities?
answer: Registration for the various events will be available through the TARANG website (link) via Paytm Insider. Participants must register for each event individually.

question: Will there be a refund if we wish to cancel after registration?
answer: Yes, there will be refunds available until [date]. // No, refunds will not be available post registration.

question: Will accommodation facilities be available during the fest?
answer: Yes, limited accommodation will be available on a first-come, first-served basis.

question: Are there any accommodations for individuals with disabilities?
answer: Yes, necessary accommodations will be made for individuals with disabilities.

question: What date will accommodations be available until?
answer: Accommodations will be available until the 5th of November, or the last day of TARANG fest.

question: What is the events schedule?
answer: The events schedule will be available on the TARANG website (link) one week before the fest.

question: Is there registration fees for events?
answer: Registration fees for each event will be displayed on the TARANG website, as well as on the brochure.

question: Will parking facilities be available for the duration of the fest?
answer: Yes, limited parking facilities will be available on campus.

question: Is there early bird access for the teams?
answer: Yes, early bird access will be available for teams. Stay on the lookout! // No, early bird access will not be available for events.

question: How will we manage food once we reach the event venue?
answer: Food stalls and canteens will be set up all across the campus during the period of the fest for your enjoyment.
